definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The bleakness is with strong red and green background, dispersing after a grand feast.
sentences.chinese: 這是一片大紅大綠襯托出的蒼涼，盛宴後的散席。

sentences.english: It's surprising that she wore bright red and green clothes today.
sentences.chinese: 她今天怎麼穿了件大紅大綠的衣服？

sentences.english: I do not like the bright red green, and always felt it was kind of tacky to flirtatious.
sentences.chinese: 我非常不喜歡大紅大綠，總覺得那是一種俗氣的妖豔。
